thread.title: Pep Guardiola bans sale of chocolate at Manchester City…even forbidding STAFF from buying it
thread.title_full: Pep Guardiola bans sale of chocolate at Manchester City…even forbidding STAFF from buying it

author: tgannon
title: Pep Guardiola bans sale of chocolate at Manchester City…even forbidding STAFF from buying it
text:
Even Manchester City STAFF are no longer allowed to purchase chocolate at the club Pep Guardiola : It's impossible to play good football without make sex with your partner Manchester City 1-1 Liverpool : Aguero equalises after Milner scores penalty MOST READ IN FOOTBALL Joe Hart shows incredible sportsmanship as he fist bumps Lukas Podolski after German scores screamer mark of respect FA plan tribute to security services and victims against Lithuania on Sunday after terror attack Team news Jake Livemore and Michael Keane start for England in Germany as Gareth Southgate experiments with 3-4-3 new look Jake Livermore starts and Michael Keane makes debut as England boss Gareth Southgate tries out 3-4-3 experiment NEVER MOVED SO FAST Manchester United flop Bastian Schweinsteiger is seen moving out of Cheshire mansion just one day after MLS switch is announced Cheltenham gold Real Madrid look to sign ex-Tottenham flop and Cheltenham Town loanee Yuri Berchiche 
Triathlete and former tennis player Tremoleda worked as a dietitian at Barcelona, and is a well-known author in her native Spain. 
Guardiola set up a fat camp at the start of the season to get his players in tip-top shape. 
Gael Clichy explained: "If your weight is too high, you’re not training with the team. 
“That is the first thing. You hear it a lot but for my part it’s the first time any manager has really done it. BANNED AT MANCHESTER CITY...
